DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Treatment Efficacy Modified Positive Airway Pressure Device Treat Obstructive Sleep Apnea
DOC.criteria: Aged 18 Diagnosed OSA practice physician prescribe Positive Airway Pressure ( PAP ) ( Continuous Positive Airway Pressure ( CPAP ) AutoCPAP ) . Participants na√Øve CPAP experience user CPAP . For experienced user PAP ( CPAP AutoCPAP ) : Using PAP 4 hours/night 70 % last 30 day ( justification allow investigator ) Contraindicated PAP ( CPAP AutoCPAP ) therapy Persons significant sleep disorder ( ) ( e.g periodic leg movement , insomnia , central sleep apnea ) Persons obesity hypoventilation syndrome congestive heart failure . Persons require supplemental oxygen PAP ( CPAP AutoCPAP ) device Persons implant electronic medical device ( e.g cardiac pacemaker ) Persons pregnant think might pregnant .
